SculptAnimUI¶

class source.Sculpt_anim.ui.SculptAnimUI(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Sculpt anim tool UI

Functions

SculptAnimUI.create_connections()

Create all connection of QWidget

SculptAnimUI.create_delete_menu()

Populate delete popup menu

SculptAnimUI.create_layouts()

Create all layout of QWidget

SculptAnimUI.create_widgets()

Create all Widget of QWidget

SculptAnimUI.delete_all()

Delete all blendshape and reset tool

SculptAnimUI.init_tweener()

SculptAnimUI.main_delete_menu_popup()

delete delete_menu popup menu

SculptAnimUI.main_ui_quit()

Disconnect and reset what was change on tool quit

SculptAnimUI.reset()

update UI element and run reset function

SculptAnimUI.set_key()

Set a key on the blend shape

SculptAnimUI.show_help()

Create help window loading the html page of the tool

SculptAnimUI.timeChange(*args)

update UI element and run function depending of current frame

SculptAnimUI.toggle_edit_mode()

Toggle mesh edit mode

SculptAnimUI.update_selected_mesh(mesh)

Init tool for the selected mesh
